last_episode_to_air.name: Vengeance
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the Widow's final victim nearly in her clutches, Kenneth's time is running out; however, upon revealing the killer's identity he grapples with how to bring justice to the victims.

name: Slasher
overview: Thirty years ago, in the sleepy community of Waterbury, a killer known as “The Executioner” murdered Sarah Bennett's parents. Now Sarah and her husband Dylan have returned to town, only to find herself the centerpiece in a series of horrifying murders centered around the seven deadly sins.

seasons.name: The Executioner
seasons.overview: When Sarah Bennett returns to the small town where she was born and her parents were killed, she is plunged into a new, even bloodier murder mystery as history starts to repeat itself.

seasons.name: Guilty Party
seasons.overview: Set in the remote Canadian winter wilderness, the story revolves around a group of former summer camp counselors who are forced to return to the isolated campground to retrieve evidence of a crime they committed in their youth. Before long the group, and the camp’s latest inhabitants, members of a spiritual retreat with their own secrets to hide, find themselves targeted by someone – or something – out for horrific revenge.

seasons.name: Solstice
seasons.overview: As the presence of The Druid looms over the apartment complex – already a powder keg filled with new immigrants, white supremacists, obnoxious hipsters, and toxic marriages – the hatred and dark secrets that fester among the residents comes to a horrifying boiling point.

seasons.name: Flesh & Blood
seasons.overview: A wealthy but dysfunctional family gathers for a reunion on a secluded island. Their old wounds and competitive rivalries flare up when the family realizes a masked killer is on the island, intent on cruelly picking them off one by one.

seasons.name: Ripper
seasons.overview: There’s a killer stalking the mean streets, but instead of targeting the poor and downtrodden like Jack the Ripper, The Widow is meting out justice against the rich and powerful. The only person standing in the way of this killer is the newly promoted detective, Kenneth Rijkers, whose ironclad belief in justice may wind up being yet another victim of The Widow.

tagline: Everyone has a past. Hers will kill you.

episodes.name: An Eye For an Eye
episodes.overview: Sarah finds herself at the center of a series of copycat killings and visits the man who murdered her parents in prison and he imparts a cryptic message.

episodes.name: Digging Your Grave With Your Teeth
episodes.overview: Sarah receives a gruesome package at her new gallery. The Executioner exacts justice on citizens of Waterbury. Sarah attempts to decipher a message in her parcel. Sarah's grandmother pleads with her to leave town.

episodes.name: Like As Fire Eateth Up and Burneth Wood
episodes.overview: A disturbing secret from Sarah's past confirms her belief that the police have arrested the wrong person for the murders.

episodes.name: As Water Is Corrupted Unless It Moves
episodes.overview: Sarah believes the killer is using the seven deadly sins as part of their plan and is disappointed by the police chief's lack of responsiveness. Unfortunately Sarah's attempt to investigate the murders leads to misfortune.

episodes.name: Ill-Gotten Gains
episodes.overview: Sarah blames herself when another disturbing murder occurs. Meanwhile Allison has mixed reactions to Dylan's TV commentaries about the killings.

episodes.name: The One Who Sows His Own Flesh
episodes.overview: Sarah learns of some unsettling information about her past from Tom Winston, which leads her to believe she knows the next target of the Executioner.

episodes.name: In the Pride of His Face
episodes.overview: Convinced that Sarah is The Executioners final target, Tom Winston escapes from prison. Also Sarah discovers that Dylan knew about her past prior to meeting her.

episodes.name: Soon Your Own Eyes Will See
episodes.overview: The Executioner plans one last act of retribution while Sarah is comforted by Cam after Dylan's dishonesty.

1.name: The Executioner
1.overview: When Sarah Bennett returns to the small town where she was born and her parents were killed, she is plunged into a new, even bloodier murder mystery as history starts to repeat itself.

episodes.name: Six Feet Under
episodes.overview: Five years after concealing a murder, guilt-stricken summer camp counselors return in midwinter to the scene of their crime, now a utopian commune.

episodes.name: Between Good and Evil
episodes.overview: After a body is found and a guest vanishes, both groups discover they're trapped at the camp with communication to the outside world cut off.

episodes.name: Saint Sebastian
episodes.overview: As the list of victims continues to grow, the number of possible suspects narrows and the two groups are forced to cooperate despite mutual suspicion.

episodes.name: Night of Hunters
episodes.overview: The histories of several characters unfold in flashback, revealing surprising connections, while an innocent hiker is pulled into the unfolding drama.

episodes.name: Out of the Frying Pan
episodes.overview: The gruesome past and false identity of a commune member is discovered, although it may be too late to save the fellow camper they have kidnapped.

episodes.name: Drone
episodes.overview: Desperate to discover the identity of the killer preying on them, the remaining survivors reluctantly conduct a mock hearing to learn the truth.

episodes.name: Dawn of the Dead
episodes.overview: Misinterpreted evidence points everyone in a false direction, while one camper finds evidence that makes him question the motive behind the slaughter.

episodes.name: The Past is Never Dead
episodes.overview: The serial killer confesses to another camper, but the rest of the stranded survivors are still in the dark as final twists and truths are divulged.

2.name: Guilty Party
2.overview: Set in the remote Canadian winter wilderness, the story revolves around a group of former summer camp counselors who are forced to return to the isolated campground to retrieve evidence of a crime they committed in their youth. Before long the group, and the camp’s latest inhabitants, members of a spiritual retreat with their own secrets to hide, find themselves targeted by someone – or something – out for horrific revenge.

episodes.name: 6am to 9am
episodes.overview: On the first anniversary of a mysterious slaying, the masked killer responsible strikes again, butchering one of the earlier crime's eyewitnesses.

episodes.name: 9am to 12pm
episodes.overview: Connections to Kit are revealed in flashbacks, while a couple's secret affair is exposed via social media and another slaying strikes the community.

episodes.name: 12pm to 3pm
episodes.overview: As school is dismissed for the summer, more shocking memories from the past year surface and a teacher who tries to be an ally to Saadia pays a price.

episodes.name: 3pm to 6pm
episodes.overview: The Druid kills again as Amy recalls her role in Kit's death, Roberta questions multiple witnesses, and plans get underway for the solstice party.

episodes.name: 6pm to 9pm
episodes.overview: Roberta and Pujit identify a suspect while Violet's lurid, exploitative murder blog goes too far, making her and Joe targets of outrage and revenge.

episodes.name: 9pm to 12am
episodes.overview: Attendees of the solstice party are stalked by the Druid while someone engineers a violent confrontation in the basement between Angel and Dan.

episodes.name: Midnight to 3am
episodes.overview: Angel and Dan desperately try to escape, Roberta and Pujit get too close to the Druid, and Saadia grows closer to Connor in the hours after the party.

episodes.name: 3am to 6am
episodes.overview: With the identity of the Druid revealed, the few remaining survivors inside the apartment building must make a last-ditch fight for their lives.

3.name: Solstice
3.overview: As the presence of The Druid looms over the apartment complex – already a powder keg filled with new immigrants, white supremacists, obnoxious hipsters, and toxic marriages – the hatred and dark secrets that fester among the residents comes to a horrifying boiling point.

episodes.name: Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: As the various members of the Galloway family gather to depart for their annual reunion, years-long tensions and rivalries flare up, as they arrive at the private island home of patriarch Spencer. After receiving shocking news about his end-of-life plans, the group is faced with the resumption of a long-dormant round of cruel family competitions from the past.

episodes.name: The Sins of the Father
episodes.overview: Shocking revelations make the Galloway family competition even more difficult, as grizzly discoveries and panic grip the family, and the killer claims the first victims. Meanwhile, suspicions start to mount against one outsider following an unexpected reveal.

episodes.name: In Trust
episodes.overview: Reeling from witnessing a gruesome murder, the remaining Galloway family regroup to try and escape the island. But they quickly realize the competition can’t be stopped, no matter what. Seamus and Christy’s marriage tensions drive them further apart as more secrets from the past are revealed.

episodes.name: Upstairs Downstairs
episodes.overview: Paranoia and suspicion grow among the surviving group, as another body is discovered and terrible secrets from the past come to the surface.

episodes.name: Family Ties
episodes.overview: Still reeling from Birgit’s confession, Vincent takes his anger out on a panicked Liv, who searches for her missing mother with Theo. With Florence still focused on Vincent, O’Keefe looks for maternal comfort from Grace. The next contest for the family brings new allegiances and stunning betrayals, as Florence makes a horrific sacrifice to save her own skin.

episodes.name: Face Time
episodes.overview: After discovering Florence’s selfish crime, Theo takes matters into his own hands in dealing with his wicked mother. Christy learns more about Aphra’s past, with grisly results.

episodes.name: Goldfinger
episodes.overview: Despite their shared penchant for bloodshed, The Gentleman doesn’t spare Aphra from a gory death. Leaving only Grace, Theo, Vincent, and Liv in the competition, Grace finds herself outnumbered and fights to continue the competition, leading to another elimination and the unmasking of The Gentleman.

episodes.name: Kindred
episodes.overview: After revealing The Gentleman’s true identity, Theo, Vincent, and Liv face horrific truths about the competition and their family, and the heir to the Galloway fortune claims their prize.

4.name: Flesh & Blood
4.overview: A wealthy but dysfunctional family gathers for a reunion on a secluded island. Their old wounds and competitive rivalries flare up when the family realizes a masked killer is on the island, intent on cruelly picking them off one by one.

episodes.name: The Slaughterhouse
episodes.overview: The city's elite are thrown into panic when a member of the upper crust is murdered by a killer dubbed "the Widow." Detective Rijkers is put on the case. The city's most powerful man, Basil Garvey, is a target and works to control the investigation.

episodes.name: The Painful Truth
episodes.overview: The Widow strikes again, and Kenneth Rijkers begins connecting the killings to a 12-year-old mystery, while Basil Garvey, a business oligarch, pulls a number of strings to control the investigation.

episodes.name: Backbone
episodes.overview: Enid's newspaper declares another Widow murder; panic rises, and Kashtinsky gets high to keep focused; Eddie tries to flee, but Basil reminds him that he owns him; Kenneth uncovers proof that links the victims to the killing of Margaret Mehar.

episodes.name: Left Handed Justice
episodes.overview: The Widow sends a nasty treat to Basil and friends, which sends Kashtinsky over the edge; the Botticelli sisters arrange for Verdi to have their portraits taken; Georges Rondeau, the prime suspect in the murders, preys on Regina.

episodes.name: Everybody's Darling
episodes.overview: The Widow's latest victim is found on Valentine's Day, dragged to death behind a horse and made up to look like Cupid; a torn piece of the Widow's weeds sends Kenneth and Regina off on a hunt; Salomé entertains bidders for Verdi.

episodes.name: Resurrections
episodes.overview: The pressure gets to Israel, who admits to her and seven other involvements in Margaret's death; Kenneth secures the suspects, freeing only Israel to operate on a friend of Regina's - inadvertently putting her into the Widow's clutches.

episodes.name: Divine Secrets
episodes.overview: With Kenneth's list of suspects either jailed or buried, he sets his sights on the sly magician Georges, who is slowly losing his grip on reality.

episodes.name: Vengeance
episodes.overview: With the Widow's final victim nearly in her clutches, Kenneth's time is running out; however, upon revealing the killer's identity he grapples with how to bring justice to the victims.

5.name: Ripper
5.overview: There’s a killer stalking the mean streets, but instead of targeting the poor and downtrodden like Jack the Ripper, The Widow is meting out justice against the rich and powerful. The only person standing in the way of this killer is the newly promoted detective, Kenneth Rijkers, whose ironclad belief in justice may wind up being yet another victim of The Widow.
